text: 3:16 Rom 10:3Polɨn akɨnafarir osiriziba, da zurara bizir kabar gun mɨgei. Guizbangɨra, akar maba akɨnafarir kabar aven ikiava, egha deravɨra bigha mɨgeir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e akar kabar mɨngaribagh foghasa bar ingangarir dafam gami. Ezɨ gumazamizir fofozir muziariba ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavir muziariba, me Polɨn osirizibagh iragha pazava dav gei. Egha uaghan Godɨn akɨnafarimɨn itir akar igharaziba sara paza dav gei. Kamaghɨn me uarira uari gasɨghasɨsi, eghtɨ God gɨn me gasɨghasɨgham.
